text: Oluwa won si jepe won pe: “Dajudaju Emi ko nii fi ise onise kan ninu yin rare; okunrin ni tabi obinrin, ara kan naa ni yin (nibi esan). Nitori naa, awon t’o gbe (ilu won) ju sile, ti won le jade kuro ninu ilu won, ti won si fi inira kan won nitori esin Mi, won jagun esin, won si pa won. Dajudaju Emi yoo ba won pa awon asise won re. Emi yo si mu won wo inu awon Ogba Idera ti awon odo n san ni isale re. (O je) esan lati odo Allahu. Ni odo Allahu si ni esan daadaa wa
